location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: The table is signed by Edward Charles Ross, Political Agent at Muscat. The table is divided between the Hinawi and Ghafiri divisions and contains information in columns headed Names of Tribes. Adjective Form; Name of Tribes. Collective Plural Form; Religious Sect; Province; Villages or Districts; Number of Males; and Remarks.The Arabic content of this item is confined to letters of the Arabic alphabet appearing in the key to pronunciation and transliteration on folio 4.The date is supplied by the date of the volume as a whole.
